body: @Amazing God-King Rance most of the manhwa are actually like this so

THIS. This is perfection and NTR done in a damn good way. No cringy self-insert stupidity, all the characters including the mc have their own personality. MC isn't just an asshole (well he is, but at least it isn't his only characteristic), he has reasonable motivations and still manages to be a good guy for some reason. Art is god tier, nobody gets killed or raped, guy still has his family. This guy just feels human somehow and I can understand why he's doing whatever he does; sure it's trash, but he is human.

Thanks so much for this

It took that long for the woman in the cover to appear. Well considering she's in the cover, I suppose she's gonna get involved too.

Man's descending to madness. I don't like NTR that much but I'm curious where this goes since I'm already invested.
As he cheating left and right feels like he will soon get hard ntr his wife gonna fu*k other guys for revenge thats what happens in all shitty  ntr porhwa
Yeah, this guy went from zero to 100 on the being an asshole part real quick. And now he's probably gonna try and fuck his friend's wife and daughter.
Bruh at first I was like okay he’s trying to support the family but in a wrong way. But then he just wants to fuck bc he wants. And I’m like okay...he’s just a asshole.
The fuck is this theme now?
